instructions: On your iPhone or iPad, open the App Store . Tap Updates . In the available update list, look for Chrome. If Chrome is listed, tap Update to install it. If it is not listed, that means there's no update to install. If asked, enter your Apple ID password. The update will then download and install.

On your Android phone or tablet, open the Play Store . At the top left, tap the Hamburger Menu > My apps & games . Tap Updates. If Chrome is listed, tap Update . The update will then download and install.
